name: Hyperspace Metallurgy
description:
Fast-paced 2 players versus game where you have to conquer planets as fast as possible.

You need to use 2 Xbox-compatible controllers.

On the title screen, both players need to press A to continue.

On the map,

  • Use LB and RB to change between planets;
  • Use A to go to a planet.

On a planet,

  • Use X to spawn a Warrior on a planet. It will kill other robots.
  • Use Y to spawn a Harvester on a planet. Harvester will collect a dead robot.
  • Use A to use the spaceship beam to retrieve robots. Harvester with a dead robot count for 2.
  • Use LB or RB to go back to the map.

Made during Global Game Jam 2020 with theme "Repair":

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/hyperspace-metallurgy-6
